actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 102 of the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973 for the purpose of reducing the amount of flood insurance required on buildings and mobile homes which are in areas having special flood hazards.

summary.text: Reduces the amount of flood insurance required under the Flood Disaster Protection Act on buildings and mobile homes which are in areas having special flood hazards.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 102 of the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973 for the purpose of reducing the amount of flood insurance required on buildings and mobile homes which are in areas having special flood hazards.
